name: Parasect's New Move
description: Parasect, frustrated by his inability to learn the T.M. Ember, has taken to putting a candle on his back in its place. He can now wield the power of fire! Use Parasect's new move to burn the wood in the environment, weaving your way through danger and puzzles in the game's 3 levels. Made for Jame Gam #24. Playtime: 2-5 min.
